headline.print_headline: Boko Haram Shows Changing Al Qaeda Threat
headline.main: Boko Haram Shows Changing Al Qaeda Threat

lead_paragraph: The kidnapping of more than 200 Nigerian schoolgirls last month has sparked global outrage, launched an international manhunt and instantly turned an obscure West African militant group into a household name in the United States. And it has raised a central question: Does the rapidly growing number of al Qaeda splinter groups pose as much of a threat as al Qaeda itself?
